quote: Instead of being intimidated by the limitations, be inspired to find new ways around them. – Ralph Marston
fact: In eighteenth-century English gambling dens, there was an employee whose only job was to swallow the dice if there was a police raid.
joke: Why is it a bad idea to iron your four-leaf clover? Cause you shouldn't press your luck.
